item.title: Soft Shutdown and Consistent Boot on Power Loss
item.description: Tl;DR Computers hate having their power abruptly cut. A UPS, an Adafruit Feather board, and some python hackery keeps computers booting and shutting down gracefully when power is yanked and restored, deliberately or not.
